DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate association common carotid artery circumferential strain echocardiographic parameter leave ventricular function degree actual hemodynamic deterioration patient undergoing multi-vessel off-pump coronary artery bypass preserve leave ventricular ejection fraction .
DOC.brief_title: Association Carotid Arterial Circumferential Strain With Left Ventricular Function Hemodynamic Compromise During Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1. three vessel coronary artery disease 2. sinus rhythm 1 . New York Heart Association functional class ≥3 2. know pulmonary hypertension 3. know valvular heart disease 4. serum creatinine ≥2.0 mg/dL 5. myocardial infarction within 1 week surgery 6. history cerebral peripheral arterial occlusive disease
